recipe.name: Slow Cooker Red Beans and Rice with Sausage
recipe.time: 8 Hours and 20 Minutes (20 min prep, 8 hours cooking)

ingredient.description: canned kidney beans, rinsed and drained
cooked chicken sausage, andouille-style and cut into bite-size pieces

step.description: Add garlic (1 clove, minced), onion (1, chopped), celery (1 rib, chopped), bell pepper (1, chopped), beans (15 oz, rinsed), tomatoes with their juices (14.5 oz) and sausage (9 oz, cut into bite-size pieces) into a slow cooker. Add thyme (1/4 tsp), pepper (1/4 tsp), and broth (6 cups). Stir to combine, cover and cook on low for 8 hours.
Before serving, cook rice (1 cup dry) according to the directions on the package. Serve the rice topped with red beans and sausage from the slow cooker.
